name: Elite Commander
description:
You are a well trained elite member of special weapons and tactics teams. Equipped with sub-machine guns, sniper rifles and stun grenades, you will navigate secret missions across the globe to eradicate the evil syndicate that stands in the way of a peaceful world. Let the bullets fly now!

- Provides full realistic battlefield environment.
- The possibility to choose the game mode(easy/hard)
- More than 50 levels
